document_data.name: Alia al-Jamal umm Nabil
document_data.mainbody: '''Alia al-Jamal umm Nabil''' was a skilled [[Elemental mage|sand mage]] and chief vizier of the [[House of Asad]] tribe in the [[High Desert]] of [[west Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p37">
document_data.Description: Alia was a beautiful middle-aged woman.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p37"/>
document_data.Personality: Though Alia was soft-spoken, her voice was respected as much as that of her husband and sheikh of the tribe.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p37"/>
document_data.Activities: Alia often negotiated deals with other desert tribes and made rulings in her husband's absence.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p37"/>
document_data.Relationships: Alia was the sole wife of the tribe's leader, [[Najib bin Kamal al-Asad]]. Their eldest son was [[Nabil bin Najib]].<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p37"/>
